name: NumberRange
type: datatype
summary: |
  Represents a range of numbers.
description: |
  The Datatype.NumberRange represents a range of numbers.

  NumberRange stores its Datatype.NumberRange.Min and
  Datatype.NumberRange.Max values as 32-bit floating-point numbers. Very large
  numbers or numbers requiring high decimal precision may lose accuracy.

  - name: NumberRange.new
    summary: Returns a new Datatype.NumberRange with the provided minimum and maximum.
    description: |-

      minimum must be less than or equal to maximum.
    parameters:

        type: number

    type: number
    summary: |
      The minimum value of the Datatype.NumberRange.
    description: |
      The minimum value of the Datatype.NumberRange, always less than or equal

    default:
